item.title: 20:30-22:30 Pitch Round/Intro/Team Formation
item.description: This is a chance to speak to the group and pitch an idea, ask for help, look for a team. We will spend most of our time on this ! Please attend in person.

item.title: 22:30 Fukuoka Evening Closing Remarks/Next Place
item.description: We will offer closing remarks, and give everyone an opportunity to gather to go grab a quick bite outside in Tenjin and possibly wander off to “the next place”. Depending on access, it may be possible to work late on site.

item.title: 9:00 Breakfast
item.description: Japanese Breakfast. Coffee Available at the Cafe or nearby Convenience Store.

item.title: Fukuoka Saturday Evening Closing Remarks/Next Place 22:30
item.description: We will offer closing remarks, and give everyone an opportunity to gather to go grab a quick bite outside in Tenjin and possibly wander off to “the next place”. Depending on access, it may be possible to work late on site.

item.title: Hacking @ 10:00 -> Lunch (13:00) -> Dinner (19:00)
item.description: Open Hacking Session. Lunch at 1PM. Dinner at 17:00. Some people will lead groups to go out for food or drink during the dinner hour if you prefer outside food.

item.title: Hacking Wrap Up
item.description: Hacking Session and wrap up your projects and submit by 14:00!!!

item.title: Judging/Hackathon Demos
item.description: Judges will convene. All participant teams will demo their submissions. Please use a real AVP for the demos.

item.title: Winners Circle/Awards Ceremony
item.description: 16:00 After judging, Awards will be announced. Tune in online or in person.

item.title: zzz Celebrate Dinner/Post Party
item.description: After awards, teams are free to go home or head out to dinner together. A post party will be sponsored at 20:30 in Tenjin. Participants will be offered free drinks until 22:00. Location TBA.
